Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Charlie Mitchell
Dear Sir,
Charlie Mitchell has an ERA of 3.09 at A Cedar Rapids Reds!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of German Rivera
Dear Sir,

He has an AVG of .511, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Saturday, 5/17/1988
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Kiko Garcia



Date: Sunday, 5/18/1988
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Ellis Valentine
